transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Hi, is this Zhi? Hey, this is Arjun from MongoDB—did I catch you at a bad time?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Uh, hi Arjun. I’ve got a few minutes—what’s this about?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Awesome, thanks! I’m reaching out because I saw Acme Corp. recently kicked off a migration project, and I wanted to see if Atlas could help accelerate things or add some flexibility to your data layer.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: We did, yeah. Uh, we’re pretty deep into Snowflake right now, so I’m not sure we’re looking for new databases.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Totally hear you. Snowflake’s amazing for analytics! Where I think Atlas could help is real-time workloads—especially if you’re looking at operational data or multi-region high availability. Are those things on your radar yet?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: We’ve talked about multi-region, yeah, but honestly one concern is failover. Snowflake’s, um, pretty robust there—how does MongoDB Atlas compare?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Great question, Zhi. Atlas actually automates multi-region setup and failover, so in the event of, say, an outage, your data instantly fails over to another region—there’s no manual intervention. And everything’s encrypted, end-to-end.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Got it. How about HIPAA? We’re in healthcare, so…

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Absolutely. Atlas is fully HIPAA-eligible. We can provide BAAs, audit logs, all that—lots of our healthcare customers rely on us for clinical and patient data every day.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Okay, interesting. But, Arjun, honestly—the last migration took ages and cost a fortune. I can’t, uh, justify rocking the boat again soon.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Makes total sense. Migration is tough. One thing we do is partner closely during transitions—dedicated engineers, proof-of-concept phases, even pilots to reduce risk. You don’t have to go all-in right away.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Maybe, but Acme’s locked into a contract with Snowflake for another year. Vendor lock-in's… real.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: For sure. Lots of our customers start with just a single workload or region. Atlas is month-to-month, so you’re never tied down—and you can expand or contract as needs change.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Hmm. Okay, that’s… that’s good to know. What’s the pricing like, compared to, uh, what we’re used to?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: It’s pay-as-you-go, and most teams find it’s pretty competitive—especially for active workloads. But, Zhi, I’d love to send a follow-up that lays it all out side-by-side—would that help?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Yeah, send me an email with some details. Maybe a case study if you have one?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Absolutely. What’s the best address for you? And is there anything specific you want to see—security stuff, pricing, use cases?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: zhi.wu@acme.example. Security and healthcare references, mainly.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Perfect, I’ll pull those together and send them over by tomorrow. Thanks for your time, Zhi—really appreciate it.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Thanks Arjun. Take care.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: You too. Bye!
